title: The Future
author: The Future
content: Hey everyone, I just wanted to know more about KCGI 2023. What exactly is it, and what makes it stand out from other trading competitions?Is it really worth trying?

comments.author: Iamcrypticguy
comments.body: Quote from: The Future on August 25, 2023, 02:16:56 PMHey everyone, I just wanted to know more about KCGI 2023. What exactly is it, and what makes it stand out from other trading competitions?Is it really worth trying?KCGI is a crypto trading competition hosted by Bitget .. Different trading activities involved includes spot, futures, demo and futures copy trading. Personally, I see it as more than a mere competition cause it also lays emphasis on community involvement and learning; which is a standout feature.The event offers webinars, discussions, and insights from industry professionals, enhancing participants understanding of trading. So, it's pretty cool imo

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: It's a trading competition powered by Bitget Exchange, and what actually makes it unique compared to other trading competitions? This query has many explanations, but the one I have seen is that it has good rewards, and they are also rewarding a mini helicopter. But to be honest, I do not think it is the biggest trading competition, or it might depend on the factors one keeping in mind to declare one as the biggest trading competition.But I do not like BitGet, and I do not even use it, but if you think it's worth joining, then it's up to you.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Quote from: The Future on August 25, 2023, 02:16:56 PMHey everyone, I just wanted to know more about KCGI 2023. What exactly is it, and what makes it stand out from other trading competitions?Is it really worth trying?It's not that it really stands out from other trading competitions but since the prizes are really big and insane (Up to 2,650,000 USDT, Airbus H135 Helicopter, Tesla Cyberquad, and an iPhone 15 Pro Max, etc.) it was different from the usual trading competition we do see at most cases.Is it worth trying? Well, only you can answer that if you are really interested in participating. I would be silent about some possible irregularities that might happen here or inside jobs of some sort but doing such will just make Bitget ruin their reputation. By participating here, you trust them to be fair and square.Anyways, it's mentioned in the FAQ that you are not allowed to register after the registration period ends. As of this posting, around 6 days left to register and have a spot. You are the one who needs to decide if you will participate here or not. Just read carefully all the terms as much as possible.

Anyway that's a side story the Point is Trading competition I'm not gonna be particular with the KCGI and Bitget or any other exchange. Generally trading competition is for the marketing of the project, boosting the volume, attracting new investors, etc. Most of the time the high capital holder enters such trading competition trades as you and I with average capital mostly avoid such type of trading competition but it can be a good opportunity in a side way.During the completion due to the hype and volatility by taking a few precise trades you can generate a decent profit, except for that the trading competitions are not recommended for newbies and early traders.
